behaviors.zh_CN: 此应用没有请求存储权限，但授予此应用 Root 权限后，应用可通过 Root 权限在根目录建立 CardEmulator 文件夹，对此存储空间隔离无能为力，建议手动移动 CardEmulator 文件夹至合适位置。
behaviors.en: This app does not request for storage permissions, but after granting Root permission to this app, the app can create CardEmulator folder in the root directory with Root permission, so there is nothing Storage Isolation can do about it, and we recommend to move the CardEmulator folder to the right place.
